page.title: 08WORKING IN S.E. BOLDRE
page.content: There is an electrical shop,a P.O./ general store,a pub,2 building firms and small buisinesses,including a lobster fisherman.There are mixed farms,dairy herds,a chicken farm, several soft fruit PYO,and market gardens.Pylewell Park has an expanding shoot run by a tenant gamekeeper. Newton Park also has a shoot. Game includes partridge,mallard,woodcock, hare,rabbit and snipe.A few deer are also sighted.Most people go outside the area for work.There are factories in nearby Lymington & Hythe, & Southampton is within easy reach. The main line station is at Brockenhurst, 3 miles away,so commuting is possible. There are 4 schools though not all the taechers live near their work.
